data: Application parfaitement adapt√©e au suivi sportif y compris au sommeil r√©cup√©rateur. Une difficult√© √† conserver les donn√©es (fr√©quence cardiaque et sommeil) sur la synth√®se quotidienne. √âric

I hate this app, and as a result I won't be buying garmin products anymore. Incredibly frustrating user experience. Constantly annoys me for permissions, it needs an option that I can tell it to stop asking me. I don't want everything syncing to my watch constantly! And for certain aspects that I have actually given permission, it seems to forget those and also ask me to reapprove

Impossible de partager sur Facebook comme avant et sans photo. Sinon les synchro se fond correctement. Au nombre de pas, d √©tages, je pr√©f√®rerai un rappel des entra√Ænements, les validation de ceux ci, mettre la natation comme une activit√© physique √† part enti√®re et donc inclure les donn√©es, le total des activit√©s semaines etc... Et il serait utile de pouvoir sauvegarder  les caract√©ristiques r√©glages montre, activit√©s.. . Surtout quand celle ci est remplac√©e par le SAV. Cela √©vite de tout recommencer et pester

Tr√®s bonne applications vraiment pour commencer ou reprendre la course y a pas mieux pour accompagner et motiver... Juste une choses negative c'est les programme d'entra√Ænement qui sont en anglais et pas trop de choix au d√©part.
The app works well, whilst I'd like it to more data avenues for extrapolation and the integration of apps could be easier. I feel this is reliable and competent app.
juste un regret il n'y a pas l'activit√© exercices renfo musculation ou gym

Having just bought Garmin Forerunner 630 I was most disappointed to discover that my phone's Bluetooth is not compatible with my android phone (apparently you need Bluetooth 4.0). I do not have a computer running either Windows or Mac so I have no means to get any of my runs off of my watch...  Update - thanks for the reply Garmin Support :)   Upgraded my phone (it's been an expensive month!) and now it works OK.  Also had to borrow someone's Windows (yuk) machine to do the initial setup so that I can set up the WIFI.  I have upped my initial rating of 1 star to 3. What this application is lacking is the means to set up WIFI connections on the watch (you still have to use Garmin Express on a PC/Mac to do this which kept crashing). I think if Garmin Connect could include this functionality it would be a real plus.

The app is a little slow updating the weather but it is quick to update your activities and vitals. The weather isn't always accurate and the rain percentage is off usually a good bit. The weather is not always off with the rain and temperatures so it is tolerable. I love how the app shows your route you took when you navigate. The gps is accurate and that is a big plus.

Bonne application dans l'ensemble mais dans les √©quipements il manque l'option "trail" "vtt", "ski " , "ski de randonn√©e " , "ski de fond" car lorsque l'on fait plusieurs activit√©s diff√©rente on doit a chaque fois changer l'√©quipement de base. Donc merci de rajouter ces options.

No issues for me and more features than I'm currently using! Only recommendation I would make is the ability to assign body weight to an exercise in post workout editing if the app doesn't automatically detect that the exercise is a body weight exercise. You can only assign numbers.
Add input for blood pressure, please...
On one phone I can record in St and lbs,  not on one plus 3 though,  should be really simple in theory.  Linking to targets on the main garmin account would be be beneficial.

New colours but no updated sync. The app gives nice details of activities and is a useful addition when you are out and about and want to review achievements. However I use it with both an Edge 810 and Fenix 2 and bluetooth sync REALLY REALLY sucks. The sync is very slow (compared to over the wire via Garmin Express) but the progress information displayed in the app is way too minimal. It would really help to have a list of the activities on the device which require syncing and better progress graphics
Assez complet, interface encore am√©liorable, continuer!

L'application est tr√®s compl√®te. On peut faire √©norm√©ment de suivis. Relever des d√©fis. Manque de simplicit√© et d'intuitivit√©! Les appareils sont de bonnes qualit√©s mais l'application n'est pas au niveau. Trop superflue et redondante, ne va pas √† l'essentiel. Bonjour. Au lieu de vous murer dans le silence ou plut√¥t tromper les utilisateurs en cachant votre probl√®me de piratage par un argument maintenance vous feriez mieux de rendre accessibles nos donn√©es directement sur les montres ce serait beaucoup plus simple. If you're on the previous version, do not upgrade. I have had 2 upgrades, originally you needed to turn on location to connect the watch then you could turn location off. Next update (the last version) there was no need to turn on location services ever, it just connected and synced perfect. This update requires location to be on full time or the watch disconnects.  Seriously Garmin? It can't be an Android requirement if the previous version worked flawlessly without it. Now you're asking just too much.
Appli sympa dommage qu'on ne puisse pas mettre de photos

How hard can it be to make the calibration in a treadmill activity count? Or the time? Or the steps? Everything seems ok in the device, but then it gets transferred to this app and everything is messed up!

I say that i like it, i would love it if it would have the option of Zumba or dance.

The vivosmart HR wrist band is great device BUT the app is too complicated to use.......Every couple days has to edit the figures because for no reason it goes back to app default......Front homepage can't add or remove the excersizes......Too many options linked to the same pages.....No Map review where I have done my excersizes ....No Widget as (Android is king of widgets).....I would like these these problems to be solved and add some extra features because the wrist band is a great device to use...
